#Question 2; Part a# 

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
p = seq(0, .1, length = 1000)
plot(p, dgamma(p, shape = 5, rate = 250), type = 'l')
```

#Question 2; Part cii#

```{r}
plot(p, dgamma(p, shape = 21, rate = 943), type = 'l')
```

#Question 2; Part civ#
```{r}
ll <- qgamma(0.025, shape = 21, rate = 943)
ul <- qgamma(0.975, shape = 21, rate = 943)

c(ll,ul)
```
The credible interval is 0.014 to 0.033. Meaning there is a 95% chance the parameter is within this interval. 

#Question 2; part cv#
```{r}
pgamma(0.02, shape = 21, rate = 943)
```
The posterior probability that rate is less than 0.02 is 0.34.
